job_history.work_description: Answering phones, discussing patient accounts with patients, providing assistance to patients with their bills, reading EOB's to provide information, collecting payments, scheduling payment plans for large balance accounts, updating patient information in Allegra, changing the strategy on accounts, updating insurance information, scheduling claims to be sent, printing and mailing documents, faxing documents, and all other duties as assigned by management.

Sorting and prepping paper termed Employee Files, accurately removing any confidential patient information from all Employee files prior to scanning and indexing them, working a daily report in Onbase Workflow to ensure all applications and background check information are properly scanned and indexed in the employees chart, scanning and indexing supporting I9 documents, manual entry of I9 information into Heat Application, prepping and sorting Education assistance documentation prior to scanning, uploading and indexing documents sent via e-mail to the Medical Records online queue.

Obtaining evidence of Durable Medical Equipment dispensed, billing charges for equipment to the patient and/or insurance company, obtaining evidence was not limited to reading doctor/surgical notes, locating and applying the appropriate diagnosis code (ICD-9) in order to ensure coverage, locating ABN and other physical documentation scanned into the patient's medical chart for Medicare Billing, maintaining deadlines and timely filing limits set forth by the appropriate insurance provider of the patient, researching CPT and ICD-9 coding discrepancies for compliance and reimbursement accuracy, maintaining strict patient and physician confidentiality.

Responsible for the data entry of orders for Durable Medical Equipment dispensed from Advocate Hospital Emergency Rooms and Doctor's Offices, applying the correct ICD-9 code and code coordinate based on the equipment provided, answering and dispatching calls within the facility using Alcatel Overhead paging as well as through the phones, assisting patients with questions in regards to their delivery of equipment or other services provided, assisting walk-in patients with picking up or returning equipment, creating Letters and Certificates of Medical Necessity for Durable Medical and Respiratory Equipment, contacting Physician's Offices to obtain this form of documentation for billing purposes, searching data base for appropriate diagnosis codes, ABN's, and other signed physician's orders in order to provide proof for billing to patient's insurance provider.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience handling customer inquiries, resolving issues, and providing assistance to patients, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Medical Billing
skills.explanation: Has over 7 years of experience in medical billing, including data entry, coding, and reimbursement, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Data Entry
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience with data entry, including accurate and timely entry of patient information, orders, and billing data, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: ICD-9 Coding
skills.explanation: Has experience with ICD-9 coding, including applying correct codes for billing purposes, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: CPT Coding
skills.explanation: Has experience with CPT coding, including researching discrepancies for compliance and reimbursement accuracy, suggesting solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Patient Confidentiality
skills.explanation: Has experience maintaining strict patient confidentiality, including handling sensitive medical information, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Has experience meeting deadlines and managing multiple tasks, including data entry, billing, and customer service, suggesting solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has experience communicating effectively with patients, physicians, and other healthcare professionals, including answering phones, dispatching calls, and responding to inquiries, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Medical Records Management
skills.explanation: Has experience with medical records management, including scanning, indexing, and maintaining accurate records, suggesting solid working proficiency.
